name: Winning Post / ウイニングポスト
description: The first "Winning Post" was released in 1993. It allows players to experience the romantic life of a horse owner. As an owner, you will interact with trainers, stable hands, and jockeys to raise the best racer you can.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7(*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 22KHz WAVE file can be played
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7(*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 22KHz WAVE file can be played
